title: Can't login?
body: Just got home, new patch it up. Updated my league and now it won't log in? Before this I was having trouble logging in, I would have to restart the client multiple times to get it to finally let me in. Ive tried the repair tool and even disabling my AV but no luck :/

replies.body: Good thing none of these links are helping.

Hey everyone,

Not being able to login can be frustrating as hell, since nothing is really obvious as to why its failing (and to the credit of **Get Fertilized**, we have seriously buff our error messages).  These errors can be very tricky to pin down and figure out because there are a lot of root causes, commonly:  

- Issues with your OS's permission settings -- having proper Admin access for example
- A type of certificate error with Internet Explorer/Safari or with your Internet Options
- Your computer isn't able to establish a consistent connection to our Login Server

Because it can be extremely varied, try the steps in our [Login troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues).  It has some of the most common solutions to these root causes that should get you past this animation and into a real game of League!

If you have tried all of the steps here, and still can't get past this screen regardless of how much you swear at your monitor, then it may be a more complicated issue with connection settings being the root cause.  Therefore,  make sure that you complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.  While I am not blaming your connection in any way, we need to make sure we can rule it out as a possibility. 

Nothing coming up Milhouse?  Don't give up just yet!  Make sure to [submit a ticket to us here in Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We can look into your issue much more in-depth in a one-on-one setting and get you some specific steps to take to resolve this issue.  If you do submit a ticket, include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

Same thing here. 

I have a shortcut in the start menu that is set to run as admin

lolclient, lolpatcher, and lollauncher are all running in the processes, but after the launcher it tends to just !@#$ the bed and do nothing.

I've done the proposed fix [here](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3330957), but that is always tentative. It seems to work the first time, but might not do so everytime.

Only thing I've found that works with any consistency whatsoever when this happens is ending the lolclient.exe process (which then **usually **shuts down the other two), running lol as admin and clicking "Launch" as soon as the word shows up in the launcher.

I hope this helps someone until Riot finds a more reliable solution.
Same issue here, was able to login running the lol.launcher.admin.exe found in your install location, default should be: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Same thing here, sometimes it works to restart the client, sometimes it does not. I am also having really strange log issues, not normal lag. In these instances of lag I am seeing champions glide across the map and their health bars depleting. This is surely because they are all still connected and playing, for some reason I am not. Now I have a 20 minute leaverbuster because of this disconnection issue and I am NOT happy. 

Where is the visibility and awareness? We deserve to be addressed.
Same shit man. For about a week I have to restart client 3-4 times just for it to get past logging on.... Now it just sits there for 3 minutes and says unknown error. Ty Riottt!
Goddamn… me too guys. the fuck is this shit? RITO HELP PLOX. FFS… you would think they would pay attention to these… but yet again, that would make sense

have had the same problem
riot just doesnt want to help
